'''Albert Longmuir''' is the judge who presided over the case over custody of [[Lucas Wilder]].

==History==
He heard the arguments in the case to determine custody of Lucas. After everyone testified, he ruled that Pete would retain full custody, with Violet getting supervised visitation.

==Career==
He is a judge in [[Los Angeles]].
